EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_HoneywellForgePTMD_KK.Honeywell Forge now includes PTMD - Q3 resta
EmailTemplate.subject: PTMD migration to Honeywell Forge is complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> Your PTMD migration is now complete! We are finalizing the process of migrating our Predictive Trend Monitoring and Diagnostics (PTMD) solution into Honeywell Forge. Note: there is no additional cost associated with the transition to Honeywell Forge. We have completed the migration of your company's assets into the new application that is part of Honeywell Forge. Our Honeywell PTMD support team will be available if you have any questions about the transition process. See below for details. You can log in to your new PTMD app right away:
- Visit: https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/ <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> - Launch Connected Maintenance - User name: use your existing user name - Password: use your existing password
You can start using the system immediately:
- You can view this presentation that covers the familiar features in the new interface - Access the system and log problems with your data - Explore the new interface and note how features are presented
Please note that soon we are going to announce a sunset period for the legacy application. If any issues arise, please reach out to our support team below:
Airline Region
Honeywell Forge - PTMD Support
Contact email
EMEAI

This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
